ROOT.sql:query:
SELECT '' AS FORM_ID, '' AS FORM_NAME, PI_SUBJECT, PI_NAME, isnull(PI_DSCR, '') PI_DSCR, PI_INITIATOR_NAME, PI_INITIATOR_ID, PI_ID, PI_STATE, PI_PPI_ID, PI_PI_ID, CONVERT(VARCHAR(16),PI_STARTED,120) AS PI_STARTED, CONVERT(VARCHAR(16),PI_FINISHED,120) AS PI_FINISHED, CONVERT(VARCHAR(16),PI_DELETED,120) AS PI_DELETED, PF_ID, PF_SUB_KIND, PF_PERFORMER_ID, PF_PERFORMER_NAME, WI_PERFORMER_ID, WI_PERFORMER_NAME, WI_DEPUTY_ID, WI_DEPUTY_NAME, WI_STATE, CONVERT(VARCHAR(16),WI_CREATED,120) AS WI_CREATED, CONVERT(VARCHAR(16),WI_FINISHED,120) AS WI_FINISHED, CONVERT(VARCHAR(16),WI_DELETED,120) AS WI_DELETED, WI_ID, WI_NAME, isnull(PI_INITIATOR_UNIT_ID, '') PI_INITIATOR_UNIT_ID, isnull(PI_INITIATOR_UNIT_NAME, '') PI_INITIATOR_UNIT_NAME, isnull(CASE PI_BUSINESS_DATA1 WHEN 'b1' THEN '' ELSE PI_BUSINESS_DATA1 END, '') AS PI_BUSINESS_DATA1, isnull(PI_BUSINESS_DATA2, '') PI_BUSINESS_DATA2
FROM WF_WORKITEM_LIST (NOLOCK) WHERE ( PF_PERFORMER_ID = @USER_ID OR WI_DEPUTY_ID = @USER_ID) AND WI_STATE = @WI_STATE AND PI_STATE = @PI_STATE AND WI_DELETED IS NULL AND PF_STATE = '1' AND ( PF_SUB_KIND IN ('T000','T002','T003','T004','T005','T006','T008','T009') ) AND PI_BUSINESS_STATE NOT LIKE '02_02%' AND PI_FINISHED >= DATEADD(Month,CONVERT(INT,0-@PI_VIEW_DATE),getdate()) AND SUBSTRING(CONVERT(CHAR, PI_FINISHED, 112), 1, 6) = @PI_FINISHED ORDER BY PI_STARTED DESC FOR XML AUTO
